name: Out of the Stacks
description:
Controls are described in-game.

Guide your player through the university library stacks and beyond, as you grapple with the odd creatures who come alive in the depths of the stacks in this story-based platformer with embedded logic puzzles. 

A light-hearted take on the horror genre, created for the Themed Horror Game Jam #6 in about 6 weeks, with the Jam theme "Among the Stars."  There are hints at the theme throughout, but the thematic connection becomes apparent in the final scenes.
